sub_title: DIRECTOR, SPORT ACCESS PARTNERS EAST AND CENTRAL REGIONS, NIKE EHQ
summary:
QUALIFICATION AND EXPERIENCE:  
Senior business leader with 20 plus years of sales, retail, trade marketing and business transformation experience with proven track record delivering strong results within FMCG and Sporting Goods. Large scale revenue growth and management ($1bln NRS, $500mln NR). Multinational, multicultural sales, planning and customer ops team’s leadership; Strategy development and successful transformation of respected territories, countries, strategic (multi-brand & mono-brand) and distributor’s partners; 
KEY SPECIALIZATION: 
Integrated marketplace and new retail channels development; omnichannel and digital transformation. Leadership and team building, organizational transformation; multi-country operational management; bottom and topline growth; strategy development; market and consumer segmentation and differentiation; crisis management
